title: Person of Interest - Preview: Root Cause
author: CBS
comment: These scenes are hilarious, how in the world do they keep a straight face doing them, amazing.
LOVE this vid, the fight scene awesome!! JC/Reese so sexy when taking down a felon.
"Pretty sure that's a parole violation Teddy."
He seems to do a lot of confu in fights
description: They built the machine that can save lives, but this time, someone has their number. Who will save them? Tune in on Thursday, February 2nd at 9/8c only CBS!
